content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 18 Apr 2019I started off investing with a passive strategy, how do I know when I should move to a more active investing strategy?1 answerAnswerBump0

HC Tang, Financial Enthusiast, Budgeting at The SocietyLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 18 Apr 2019IMHO, I think only if one were to : 1) Have at least 10-20% daily of your time to research , learn and read up
2) Gone for more investing courses or more studies and practice
3) Willing to make active investing learning as another job of yours0 comments0
